subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 新生报到时与工作人员打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! You're here for registration, right?

responses.text: Yeah, I'm a new student. My name's Alex.
responses.text_cn: 对，我是新生，我叫亚历克斯。

responses.text: Yes, I am. I'm Alex Chen, from China.
responses.text_cn: 是的，我是陈亚历克斯，来自中国。

responses.text: Yep, just got here.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简单自我介绍开启对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Great! Can I get your student ID or application number?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太好了，能给我你的学号或申请号吗？

responses.text: Sure, it's S2024-8876. I wrote it down.
Hold on, let me find it in my email.
responses.text_cn: 等一下，我找找邮件里的。

responses.text: I think it's on my acceptance letter.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提供编号避免耽误时间

subScenes.name: 核对信息
subScenes.description: 确认姓名、地址等信息是否有误

qaPairs.speakerText: Hmm, your address says '123 Maple St'—but your passport says '125'.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗯，你的地址写的是枫树街123号，但护照写的是125号。

responses.text: Oh no! That's a typo—I live at 125. Can you fix it?
responses.text_cn: 天啊！打错了，我住125号，能改吗？

responses.text: You're right, it's 125. Thanks for catching that!
Oops, my bad. 125 is correct.
responses.text_cn: 不好意思，我写错了，125是对的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌纠正错误并请求更新

qaPairs.speakerText: Your major's listed as 'Biology'—did you mean 'Biochemistry'?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的专业写的是生物学，你是想写生物化学吗？

responses.text: Actually, I switched to Biochem last week. Please update it!
responses.text_cn: 我上���改成了生物化学，请更新一下！

responses.text: Yes, I changed it—thanks for checking!
No, Biology's fine.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确说明专业变更并请求修正

subScenes.name: 办理学生卡
subScenes.description: 领取学生卡并确认激活状态

qaPairs.speakerText: Here's your student card. It's activated for the library and dining hall.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是你的学生卡，已开通图书馆和食堂权限。

responses.text: Awesome! Can I use it for the gym too?
responses.text_cn: 太棒了！健身房也能用吗？

responses.text: Thanks! I'll need to add my meal plan later.
Got it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动询问其他功能是否可用

qaPairs.speakerText: Your card photo looks a bit blurry—want a new one taken now?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的照片有点模糊，现在要重拍一张吗？

responses.text: Yes, please—I’ll do it now.
Nah, it's fine—I’ll fix it online later.
responses.text_cn: 不用，能凑合，我网上再改。

responses.text: Is it really that bad?

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据需求决定是否重拍照片

subScenes.name: 确认缴费
subScenes.description: 核实学费是否已付清并询问余额

qaPairs.speakerText: Your tuition's paid in full, but your housing fee is still pending.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 学费已付清，但住宿费还没交。

responses.text: Oh no! How do I pay it now?
I thought I paid it—can you check again?
responses.text_cn: 我以为交了，能再查一下吗？

responses.text: I'll pay it online tonight.

qaPairs.usageNote: 遇到欠费时立即询问支付方式

qaPairs.speakerText: You’ve got a $200 refund due—want it sent to your bank or as a check?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你有200美元退款，要打到银行卡还是寄支票？

responses.text: Bank transfer, please—I don't have a local address yet.
responses.text_cn: 请打到银行卡，我还没本地地址。

responses.text: Check’s fine—I'll pick it up later.
Wait, refund? I didn't overpay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据自身情况选择退款方式

subScenes.name: 询问校园活动
subScenes.description: 咨询新生欢迎活动和地点

qaPairs.speakerText: The welcome party's tonight at 7 in the Student Union building.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 新生派对今晚7点在学生活动中心。

responses.text: Is it open to all new students? I'm a bit shy.
responses.text_cn: 所有新生都能去吗？我有点害羞。

responses.text: Cool! How do I get there from the dorm?
Got it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动询问地点和参与门槛

qaPairs.speakerText: There’s also an ESL meet-up tomorrow at 4 in Room 203 of the Language Center.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 明天下午4点语言中心203室还有英语角。

responses.text: Perfect—I need to practice! Is it casual?
responses.text_cn: 太好了！我需要练习，是轻松的吗？

responses.text: I'm not sure I can make it.
Can I join even if I'm not ESL?
responses.text_cn: 我不是ESL学生也能参加吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认活动是否适合自己参与
